question: show me the name, qualification and title for all authors and articles
sql_query1: Select name, Degree, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id
sql_query2: Select name, Certificate, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id
sql_query3: Select name, Degree, Certificate, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id
interpretation1: For each author, list their name, degree and article titles.
interpretation2: For each author, list their name, certificate and article titles.
interpretation3: For each author, list their name, degree, certificate and article titles.
sql_query_general: Select name, Qualification, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id

question: Give me a list of all investigative journalists, their qualifications and their article titles
sql_query1: Select name, Degree, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id Where Investigative_Journalist=1
sql_query2: Select name, Certificate, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id Where Investigative_Journalist=1
sql_query3: Select name, Degree, Certificate, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id Where Investigative_Journalist=1
interpretation1: Give me a list of all investigative journalists, their degrees and their article titles
interpretation2: Give me a list of all investigative journalists, their certificates and their article titles
interpretation3: Give me a list of all investigative journalists, their degrees, their certificates and their article titles
sql_query_general: Select name, Qualification, title From journalists Join articles on articles.authorId = journalists.id Where Investigative_Journalist=1
